name: Neon Sundown
description:
Neon Sundown is a fast-paced roguelite shooter where you mow down hundreds of enemies at a time in different challenging arenas. Build a powerful arsenal of weapons using a variety of different playing cards unlocked through the in-game XP system, and try to take down all the enemies that reside in each arena.

Game Features...

  • A variety of unique playing cards to use
  • A powerful arsenal of ships to choose from
  • Numerous diverse and challenging arenas
  • Unlockable power modules to upgrade your ship
  • Tons of different enemies to take on
